projects.title: OracyBox
projects.description: A blended e-learning solution that attempts to solve the difficulties in current oracy (speaking and listening skills) strategies in primary schools across Wales. The project was developed in conjunction with a member of the education industry. What is delivered is a Laravel/Symfony full-stack application to provide the tools necessary for teachers to record and provide feedback on a range of activities. Activities are then carried out by pupils in the classroom with an iOS application for the iPad.

projects.title: Fake News Quiz
projects.description: Using PolitiFact data, this a simple react application which aims to test your ability to identify which of two news articles is fake and real. Loading may take some time due to using a free-tier dyno in Heroku.

projects.title: Tetris JS
projects.description: I wanted to see if I could develop Tetris (using the official rule book) using only HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Loading may take some time due to using a free-tier dyno in Heroku.

icons.title: Full-Stack Web Development
icons.description: I have skills and experience to develop full-stack web applications and services in a variety of technologies. My knowledge area for full-stack apps include HTML/CSS/JS, MERN stack, AWS . I'm able to create and maintain APIs, web servers, and dockerised environments.

icons.title: Database Systems
icons.description: I have a detailed level of understanding relational database management systems. I have experience with normalisation and a wide range of SQL languages, most notably MySQL/MariaDB, and NoSQL such as MongoDB and Redis. I also have the know-how to implement and use databases in software applications and RESTful APIs.

icons.title: E-Commerce
icons.description: I have knowledge in business and have experience with developing an e-commerce site. The Business and Web module I undertook involved responsive web design through CSS frameworks, CMS such as Wordpress, and marketing include social media, email, and blogging.

icons.title: Project Management
icons.description: Through project management modules in education and working in an agile environment, I have experience with working with project planning. I'm able to work in Agile methodologies such as SCRUM with the inclusion of DevOps, Continuous Testing/Delivery, and Kanban Boards.

experience.title: Software Developer
experience.description: I worked at the Siemens Technology and Sevices Pvt Ltd as part of it's MindSphere, and WinCC Unified Edge. My role was software developer where I was a part of a fast paced and encouraging workforce. My responsibilities includes:
responsibilities: Providing system support for all environments including our production teams
Working on technical implementation of apps and infrastructure
Supporting the creation of standardised documentation and code review
Developing, testing and supporting current systems

experience.title: Intern
experience.description: I worked among a team of peers to use ML to build a recommendation engine which could suggest movies based on previous viewing data.This was a full-time internship, during summer brake.

experience.title: Intern
experience.description: Focussing on e-commerce website, I worked on making the site compatible to more types of screens and cleared bugs that happen at different resolutions. This was mainly in the evenings, after my undergrad classes and during holidays
